statements.select: SELECT A.MST_CD, A.CD_NM MST_NM, B.DTL_CD, B.CD_NM DTL_NM, B.ETC DTL_ETC FROM CD_MST_INFO A ,CD_DTL_INFO B WHERE A.MST_CD = #MST_CD# AND B.MST_CD = A.MST_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.ORD ASC
SELECT MNU_CD, SYS_CD, MNU_NM, MNU_DESC, MNU_PATH, MNU_IMG, UPPER_CD, MNU_STEP, ORD, DEL_YN, EDT_ID, EDT_DT FROM SYS_MNU_INFO WHERE SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY ORD ASC

SELECT MNU_CD, SYS_CD, MNU_NM, MNU_DESC, MNU_PATH, MNU_IMG, UPPER_CD, MNU_STEP, ORD, DEL_YN, EDT_ID, EDT_DT FROM SYS_MNU_INFO WHERE SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND MNU_STEP = #MNU_STEP# AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER_CD = #UPPER_CD#
ORDER BY ORD ASC
